p:
The FT-IR spectrum of ethanolic extract of P. granatum peel is shown in Fig. 5. The characteristic absorption band exhibited C—I stretching/halo compound, C—H bending/alkane, P—O—C stretching/aromatic phosphates, S
000000000000 000000000000 000000000000 111111111111 000000000000 111111111111 000000000000 000000000000 000000000000 O stretching/sulfoxide/sulfone, C—O stretching/alkyl aryl ether, N—O stretching/Nitro compound, C
C stretching/ketone, C
O stretching/aldehyde, and N—H stretching/amine.
